0.text: Bug 122423  Support page range in RenderTask.

1.text: Support page range in render task.

2.text: For PDF format, simply log a message saying range is not supported if a range is specified, and still output whole report.

3.text: For HTML format, support page range in the form of "1,2,5-10" + "All".

4.text: The code should check if there is range set.

5.text: If so, parse it and form a range and output them one after another, with a page splitter in between just like the runAndRenderTask.

6.text: If no range is set, check if page number is set.

7.text: There can only be one page in case a page number is set.

8.text: Invalid page number should be logged, and error message is returned.

9.text: If neither is set, we default to all pages, instead of the current behavior of giving an error message.
